name: Mini Quest (Noah Colangelo)
description:
Starting off in the middle your objective as the player is to complete all 4 altars around the map to unlock the door. Expect resistance as the forest does not take a liking to people!

Currently the game ends once you go through the door. A boss style fight may be in the works but nothing set in stone. 

As of right now Mini Quest is more of a prototype idea that was created as a portfolio piece to show off my knowledge and experience with the Unity engine and programming.

I hope you enjoy your Mini Quest!

Source Code: https://github.com/NoahColangelo/MiniQuest.git

Credits:

MUSIC: Stingray Productions: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1hhizl_8j78TFSZlQN9OUw
